title: You ban Ryze or you pick Ryze
body:
Let's here it one more time!

You ban Ryze, or you pick Ryze, you ban Ryze or you pick Ryze.

If you are first pick, and you do not ban or pick Ryze, I will report you.

Although this problem could be solved by simply disabling him, why? Well because he's broken as all fuck.

Is this gonna be another Kassadin situation? goes 3 months untouched by nerfs giving insta wins to whichever team picks him?
